summary: Adds a new companion to to your game.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new animal follower to your game. 
Shadow can be found in the Abandoned Prison which is in Eastmarch, just slightly northwest of Fort Amol, on the other side of a waterfall along the White River. 

He is slightly larger than an ordinary sized dog and can be a very useful companion in your adventures. 

oh and sometimes, at first, he might not follow you outside straight away, so just fast travel to somewhere like Windhelm, that did it for me. :D
author: crazybacon96
